Package rectangles

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • rectangles.Rectangle
  • public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object
    Objects of this class are rectangles with a location (denoted by the coordinates of the bottom-left vertex), a length and a width.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private double length  
      private double width  
      private double x  
      private double y  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Rectangle()
      Create a default Rectangle with dimensions 1*1 and bottom-left vertex at the origin.
      Rectangle​(double x, double y, double length, double width)
      Create new Rectangle object with provided location and dimensions.
      Rectangle​(Rectangle other)
      Create new Rectangle object with the same location and dimensions as another Rectangle.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) double area()
      Calculate the area of a Rectangle.
      (package private) double circumcircleArea()
      Calculate the area of the circumcircle of a Rectangle.
      (package private) double circumcirclePerimeter()
      Calculate the perimeter of the circumcircle of a Rectangle.
      (package private) double diagonal()
      Calculate the length of the diagonal of a Rectangle.
      (package private) double distance​(Rectangle r)
      Calculate the distance between the centers of this and another Rectangle.
      (package private) boolean equals​(Rectangle r)
      Determine whether two Rectangles are equal.
      double getLength()
      Get the length of the Rectangle.
      double getWidth()
      Get the width of the Rectangle.
      double getX()
      Get the x-coordinate of the bottom-left vertex of the Rectangle.
      double getY()
      Get the y-coordinate of the bottom-left vertex of the Rectangle.
      (package private) boolean isSquare()
      Determine whether a Rectangle is also a square.
      (package private) double perimeter()
      Calculate the perimeter of a Rectangle.
      static void printCircumcircleEquation​(Rectangle r)
      Print the equation for the circumcircle of a Rectangle.
      static void printVector​(Rectangle r)
      Print the vector represented by the diagonal (pointing up and to the right) of a Rectangle.
      void setAll​(double x, double y, double length, double width)
      Edit the location and dimensions of a Rectangle all at once.
      (package private) Rectangle smaller​(Rectangle r)
      Determine and return the smaller of this and another Rectangle.
      (package private) void swapLengthWidth()
      Convert an m*n Rectangle into an n*m Rectangle.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Generate a well-formatted String representation of a Rectangle.
